price: 我确已把经典赏赐穆萨，并且任命他的哥哥哈伦做他的助手。
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wajaʿalnā maʿahu akhāhu hārūna wazīran
